title: Collectaholics Serif Title Font
content:
Hello. :) The font used on the title screen for collectaholics looks very familiar but I can't quite place it. Anyone have any idea what it is? Thank you!

--

And answered! Thank you so much, fvilanakis. You guys are amazing.

Font: 

 Proxima Nova (Semibold) 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140044/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
